fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
                            QUACH KIM TAI 
Date of birth: September 12, 1992. 
Gender: Male. 
Place of birth: Ho Chi Minh City. 
 
 
 
 
Contact Address: 340 Nguyen Duy Ward 10 District 8, Ho Chi Minh City. 
 
Mobile Number: 0902.187.012. 
 
Email: quachkimtai129@gmail.com. 
SUMMARY 
I am a dynamic sale executive and also have sale experience. 
I am always willing to learn and changing myself. I am also taking my advantages of sales skills, experience 
and understanding of market to become a professional Saleperson. 
 
 
EDUCATION 
Post and Telecommunications Institute of Technology (2010-2015) 
 Network Major. 
 GPA: 6.5/10. 
Nguyen Khuyen High School (2007-2010) 
 
 
EXPERIENCE 
Sale Executive and Engineer at Triet Ton Tien Medical Equipment Corporation (September/2018 – Now) 
 Finding the most competitive suppliers.  
 Forecasting the fluctuation of commodity prices and consumption trends in the market in order to make 
short & medium term plan. 
 Assisting the Accounting Department in debt management & collection. 
 Building long-term relationships with customers 
 Seeking and taking care of customers. 
 Expanding the market. 
 Maintenance Service : Take care, repair, maintenance and warrantly of medical equipment 
 Control Project : PACS. 
Account manager at SaoBacDau Technology Service JSC. (September/2017 – June/2018) 
 Finding the most competitive suppliers.  
 Forecasting the fluctuation of commodity prices and consumption trends in the market in order to make 
short & medium term plan. 
 Assisting the Accounting Department in debt management & collection. 
 Building long-term relationships with customers 
 Seeking and taking care of customers. 
 Expanding the market. 
Sale Executive at Duc Tin Medical Equipment Corporation (June/2015 – August/2017) 
 Finding the most competitive suppliers.  
 Forecasting the fluctuation of commodity prices and consumption trends in the market in order to make 
short & medium term plan. 
 Assisting the Accounting Department in debt management & collection. 
 Building long-term relationships with customers 
 Seeking and taking care of customers. 
 
 
 
 Expanding the market. 
IT Network at Phuc An Khang Hospital (Dec/2014 – June/2015) 
 Level: Junior 
 Knowledge: IT support about Networking. 
 Soft skill: fixing network systems and software bugs, supporting and proposing solutions for hospital’s 
network infrastructure. 
 
PERSONAL SKILLS 
Ability to communicate, negotiate and persuade customers. 
Proficiency in office computer. 
Analysis the market & planning. 
Team work. 
Time management to meet deadline, presentation skill, solving problem skill. 
 
 
 
 
 
REFERENCES 
Hà Thúc Trí – Product Manager – Duc Tin Medical Equipment Corporation. 
Mobile Number: 0989.989.929.
